meanings.definition: The state or quality of being goopy.
meanings.sent1: The goopiness of the slime made it fun to play with.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the goopiness of the mud on my shoes.
meanings.sent3: The goopiness of the peanut butter sandwich made it impossible to eat neatly.
meanings.sent4: The goopiness of the glue held the pieces together tightly.
meanings.sent5: The goopiness of the melted ice cream dripped down the cone.

meanings.definition: A substance that is thick, sticky, and gooey.
meanings.sent1: The goopiness of the slime stuck to my fingers.
meanings.sent2: I avoided touching the goopiness of the spilled syrup.
meanings.sent3: The goopiness of the honey made it tricky to pour.
meanings.sent4: The goopiness of the melted chocolate coated the strawberries perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The goopiness of the marshmallow made it hard to pull apart.
